casebody.data:
GRADY COBB v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (14206)

O’Connell, Landau and Hennessy, Js.

Argued October 24 decision released November 21, 1995 David B. Rozwaski, special public defender, for the appellant (petitioner). Richard F. Jacobson, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Gerard P. Eisenman, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (respondent). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
